Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Independence
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses temp. rerouted WB: Roosevelt, Independence, Congress, Pulaski and Roosevelt; EB: Roosevelt, Pulaski, 5th, Harrison, Central Pk and Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Independence, due to street blockage.

Westbound: Roosevelt, Independence, Congress, Pulaski and Roosevelt

Eastbound: Roosevelt, Pulaski, 5th, Harrison, Central Park and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Midway and the Loop
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between the Loop and Halsted due to police activity near Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between the Loop and Halsted due to police activity near Roosevelt.

As a result, trains are operating only between Midway and Halsted at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available to provide connecting service through the affected area.  

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 63rd and 35th-Bronzeville-IIT
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between 63rd and 35th Bronzeville-IIT due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between 63rd and 35th Bronzeville-IIT due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem and the Loop at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available to provide connecting service through the affected area.  

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
